attributes.action: hold a referendum and establish if the British people require a vote on the UK's continued European Union Membership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Treaty of Lisbon is a treaty that was signed by the European Union member states on 13 December 2007, which entered into force on 1 December 2009. 

It amends the Treaty on the European Union and the Treaty establishing the European Community of Rome in 1957. In this process, the TEC was renamed to Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union.

The status quo has changed substantively within the EU for the UK. Whoever wins power in the 2010 UK General Election, will need to know what the British people want regarding the UK's future Membership of the European Union as it stands post-Lisbon Treaty. 

The process starts here, thank you for your participation.
